content:
/>
XIV.2.B.2.f
.
Beneficiary Believed to Be Deceased Based on DMF Match
If the claims folder does not contain any evidence that the beneficiary is alive, take action to
terminate the award, and
give contemporaneous notice.
Note
:  If the person indicated in the DMF match is a dependent on the beneficiary’s award, review the record to ensure that notice of proposed adverse action was issued to the beneficiary prior to taking award action under
38 CFR 3.103(b)(2)
.
Reference
:  For more information on the elements in a notice of proposed adverse action, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 3.A.2.b
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section B - Social Security Death Master File (DMF) Match
